import React from 'react' import AddToCartButton from '../AddToCartButton' import BookmarkButton from '../BookmarkButton' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import useProductDetail from './product-detail.hooks' const ProductDetailCard = ({id}) => { const { productDetail } = useProductDetail(id) return ( <>
Gran Predicat

 ) } export default ProductDetailCard
